SELECT COUNT(*) AS "COUNT" FROM TB_VISITOR WHERE 1=1
AND TO_DATE(VISIT_TIME,'yyyy-mm-dd')>=TO_DATE(add_months(SYSDATE,-12),'yyyy-mm-dd')
AND TO_DATE(VISIT_TIME,'yyyy-mm-dd')>=TO_DATE(add_months(SYSDATE,-6),'yyyy-mm-dd')
AND TO_DATE(VISIT_TIME,'yyyy-mm-dd')>=TO_DATE(add_months(SYSDATE,-1),'yyyy-mm-dd')
AND TO_DATE(VISIT_TIME,'yyyy-mm-dd')>=TO_DATE(SYSDATE-7,'yyyy-mm-dd')
AND TO_DATE(VISIT_TIME,'yyyy-mm-dd')=TO_DATE(SYSDATE,'yyyy-mm-dd')
AND 1=1
AND TO_CHAR(VISIT_TIME,'HH24') BETWEEN #{front} AND #{back}

SELECT * FROM(SELECT ROWNUM AS RNUM, A.* FROM(SELECT TO_CHAR(VISIT_TIME,'yyyy.mm.dd') AS "DATE", COUNT(*) AS "COUNT" FROM TB_VISITOR GROUP BY TO_CHAR(VISIT_TIME,'yyyy.mm.dd') ORDER BY COUNT DESC) A) B WHERE RNUM=1

SELECT COUNT(*) FROM TB_VISITOR UNION ALL SELECT COUNT(*) FROM TB_VISITOR WHERE TO_DATE(VISIT_TIME,'yyyy-mm-dd')>=TO_DATE(ADD_MONTHS(SYSDATE,-1),'yyyy-mm-dd') UNION ALL SELECT COUNT(*) FROM TB_VISITOR WHERE TO_DATE(VISIT_TIME,'yyyy-mm-dd')>=TO_DATE(SYSDATE-7,'yyyy-mm-dd') UNION ALL SELECT COUNT(*) FROM TB_VISITOR WHERE TO_DATE(VISIT_TIME,'yyyy-mm-dd')=TO_DATE(SYSDATE,'yyyy-mm-dd') ORDER BY 1

SELECT * FROM TA_MEMBER_LOGIN_LOG WHERE
( 1=0
OR UPPER(MLL_USER_EMAIL) LIKE UPPER('%'||#{str}||'%') OR UPPER(MLL_REASON) LIKE UPPER('%'||#{str}||'%') OR UPPER(MLL_IP) LIKE UPPER('%'||#{str}||'%') OR UPPER(MLL_USERAGENT) LIKE UPPER('%'||#{str}||'%')
OR MLL_NO LIKE '%'||${int}||'%' OR MLL_MEM_NO LIKE '%'||${int}||'%'
)

AND MLL_SUCCESS=#{mllSuccess}
ORDER BY MLL_DATETIME DESC
